member.name: F:Blockcore.Networks.SERF.SERFMain.BitcoinMaxTimeOffsetSeconds
member.summary: Bitcoin maximal value for the calculated time offset. If the value is over this limit, the time syncing feature will be switched off.

member.name: F:Blockcore.Networks.SERF.SERFMain.BitcoinDefaultMaxTipAgeInSeconds
member.summary: Bitcoin default value for the maximum tip age in seconds to consider the node in initial block download (24 hours).
